deed.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: something someone does, especially something that is very good or very bad
deed.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: After the morningâ€™s good deeds he deserved a rest.
She tried to strangle her baby and her lover helped her finish the evil deed.
deed.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: an official paper that is a record of an agreement, especially an agreement concerning who owns property
deed.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a formal written document that is a record of an agreement, especially one relating to property
deed.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The parties to a deed should sign it in the presence of a witness.
